heading: 1 About
text:
Rural Household Multi-Indicator Survey (RHoMIS) designed collect data smallholder farmers.
survey rich information, covering range topics dietary diversity livelihoods.
much information available, can often difficult extract,
book documentating use RHoMIS R-package process
data collected Rural Household Multi-Indicator Survey.

heading: 1.1 Key Concepts
text: Data processing occurs three main steps:Verification unitsVerification prices calorie conversionsCalculation final indicators

heading: 3.1 Setup
text:
Firstly, want make sure recent
version RHoMIS R-package installed, along devtools
library:ensure folder containing data
like process. using Rstudio interactively, set
working directory folder using setwd() command.
directory structure look something like :case, working directory project folder.
code:
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/l-gorman/rhomis-R-package", force = TRUE)ðŸ“‚ project
   â”—ðŸ“‚ raw-data
     â”—ðŸ“œ sample_project.csv

heading: 3.2.1 Extracting Units
text:
extract new units data working , run 
code . code can also found 01-extract-values--initial-cleaning.R file, included
alongside Rmarkdown document.now go back project directory, able
see files added:original_units folder includes units directly calculated data.
converted_units folder include units 
verify change.
code:
library(rhomis)

new_units <- processData(
   extractUnitsOnly = T, # The stage of data processing

   # Arguments to indicate the type of processing being done (local or on server)
   dataSource = "csv",
   outputType = "csv",

   # Arguments used for processing local data sets
   dataFilePath = "raw-data/sample_project.csv",
   id_type = "string",
   proj_id = "my_project_id",
   form_id = "my_form_id"
)ðŸ“‚ project
   â”£ðŸ“‚ raw-data
   â”ƒ â”—ðŸ“œ sample_project.csv
   â”£ðŸ“‚ original_units
   â”ƒ â”£ðŸ“œ crop_yield_units.csv
   â”ƒ â”£ðŸ“œ country.csv
   â”ƒ â”—ðŸ“œ ...
   â”—ðŸ“‚ converted_units
     â”£ðŸ“œ country.csv
     â”—ðŸ“œ ...

heading: 3.2.2 Converting Units
text:
Please note, convert units next step 
calculations run, uncoverted units ignored lead 
unnecessary missing valuesIn project/converted_units directory, find series csv files
conversion factors need filled . file look
like table . first column indicates value 
found survey. second column shows conversion factor
used. conversion factor unknown, column
display NA. conversion factor known provided.
Known conversion factors already embedded R-package.range conversions enter important aware
units needed. file described detail :

heading: 3.3 Processing the Data (Part 1)
text:
unit extraction, ensure project directory.
enter commands (run 02-calculate-initial-indicators.R file):now see directory structure looks quite different:
code:
library(rhomis)

new_units <- processData(
   extractUnitsOnly = F, # The stage of data processing
   calculateInitialIndicatorsOnly = T, # The stage of data processing

   # Arguments to indicate the type of processing being done (local or on server)
   dataSource = "csv",
   outputType = "csv",

   # Arguments used for processing local data sets
   dataFilePath = "raw-data/sample_project.csv",
   id_type = "string",
   proj_id = "my_project_id",
   form_id = "my_form_id"
)ðŸ“‚ project

   â”£ðŸ“‚ original_prices
   â”ƒ â”£ðŸ“œ crop_calories.csv
   â”ƒ â”£ðŸ“œ eggs_calories.csv

   â”—ðŸ“‚ converted_prices

heading: 3.3.1 Converting Units
text:
units extracted, also need verify
prices (converted_prices folder) calorie values (
completed_calorie_conversions folder). Prices 
lcu/kg crops, meat, eggs (lcu local currency units).
Prices lcu/l milk honey. prices 
lcu/animal whole livestock sales.calorie values, conversions kcal/kg kcal/l.

heading: 3.4 Processing the Data (Part 2)
text:
Using calories prices converted, able produce
final indicators. Either run code , run 03-calculate-final-indicators.R
file.now see directory includes 
extra folders:now see directory structure looks quite different:
code:
library(rhomis)

new_units <- processData(
   extractUnitsOnly = F, # The stage of data processing
   calculateFinalIndicatorsOnly = T, # The stage of data processing

   # Arguments to indicate the type of processing being done (local or on server)
   dataSource = "csv",
   outputType = "csv",

   # Arguments used for processing local data sets
   dataFilePath = "raw-data/sample_project.csv",
   id_type = "string",
   proj_id = "my_project_id",
   form_id = "my_form_id"
)ðŸ“‚ project

heading: 3.5.1 Indicators
text:
Indicators calculated whilst data processed. cover range 
topics, including incomes, dietary diversity, household demographics. indicators
calculated depend columns present original raw-data.csv file.

heading: 3.5.2 Crop Data
text:
Found crop_data directory, csvs, column represents crops
listed survey, row represents one household (row order original dataset)

heading: 3.5.3 Livestock Data
text:
Found livestock_data directory, csvs, column represents types livestock listed survey,
row represents household.

heading: 3.5.4 Off-farm Data
text:
Found off_farm_data directory, csvs, column represents -farm activity, row represents
household.

heading: 3.5.5 Consumption Calories
text:
Found consumption_calorie_values directory, csvs, column represents products listed survey, row represents
household.

heading: 3.5.6 Consumption value
text:
Found consumption_lcu_values directory, csvs, column represents products listed survey, row represents
household.

heading: 3.5.7 Gender Control
text:
Found gender_control directory, csvs, column represents products listed survey, row represents
household.

text: Please report problems requests encounter issues section repo.
